entry.title: MAY PAG- ASA | Topic: “Judgement” with Pastor Jan Elexiz Mercado

media:group.media:title: MAY PAG- ASA | Topic: “Judgement” with Pastor Jan Elexiz Mercado
media:group.media:description:
MAY PAG- ASA | Topic: “Judgement”
Throughout this nightly series, you will discover Bible truths in a short and simple way, that can lead you to a closer relationship with our God. It is designed to help you grow in your faith in God and understanding of the Scripture. You will learn that “There is Hope” amidst crisis, pain and suffering for we have a Savior, Jesus Christ
